resources.string: Sorry, your PC\'s OS (%1$s) doesn\'t supported now

Please Wait for few seconds and Mach3Pendant will get access to your computer automatically.

 If you still see this message after 10 seconds passed than you need to make a simple set up on your computer:

 1. Download and install Mach3PendantServer application from the following website 
https://github.com/ratmole/Mach3PendantServer

 2. Connect this device and the computer running Mach3 to the same Wi-Fi network. 

 3. Restart Mach3Pendant and wait until it connects your computer automatically.
Incorrect pin. Please try enter PIN again
Pin code has been shown on your computer in a popup message near the clock. Enter it below to login. The code shows a few seconds. If you do not see, simply press the button bellow
